title: Indian Red Lentil Dal Variation 1
method: Fry onion, garlic, and ginger until soft.
Add curry powder, stir for 1 minute.
Add lentils, stock, and coconut milk. Bring to boil.
Simmer for 25 minutes until lentils are soft.
Serve with rice or naan bread.
hydrationTip: Enjoy with a glass of plain water to balance spices.
